title: Migrants will need A-level standard English to work in UK
description: The tougher rules will come in force in January as part of wider plans to cut immigration.
content:
Some migrants coming to the UK will need to speak English to an A-level standard under tougher new rules set to be introduced by the government.
The changes, which will come into force from 8 January 2026, will affect some graduates and those applyin... [4537 chars]

title: Alex Jones's appeal over £1bn Sandy Hook judgement rejected by US Supreme Court
description: The lawyers for Alex Jones say the conspiracist will never be able to pay the amount.
content:
The US Supreme Court has rejected an appeal from conspiracy theorist Alex Jones over a $1.4bn (£1bn) judgment against him after he described the Sandy Hook shooting as a hoax.
The Infowars host, who filed for bankruptcy in late 2022, had argued that ... [2107 chars]

title: DNA test confirmed alleged stalker was not Madeleine McCann, court hears
description: Investigating officer says he went against procedure to test Julia Wandelt, accused of campaign of harassment against McCann family
content:
An alleged stalker’s claim to be Madeleine McCann was ruled out after a DNA test proved conclusively she was not the missing girl, police have revealed in court.
